Bootstrap Responsive Tabs


This is a simple jQuery plugin that switches the default bootstrap tabs to accordions on the viewports that you choose to. It was build using default Bootstrap 3 classes and markup.


Note: Resize your browser window to see how it works.

Responsive Tabs

  • Home
  • Profile
  • Messages
  • Settings
